statements: SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_complaints;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT complaint_date, complaint_text FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE authority_id = 456;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE complaint_id = 789;
SELECT user_id, complaint_date, complaint_text FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM cyberbullying_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, authority_id, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM cyberbullying_complaints GROUP BY user_id, authority_id HAVING total_complaints > 1;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE complaint_text LIKE '%abuse%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM cyberbullying_complaints GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_complaints DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Complaints;
SELECT complaint_text, status FROM Complaints WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text, status FROM Complaints WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Complaints ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT authority_name FROM Authorities;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM Complaints WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE datetime >= '2022-01-01' AND datetime <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM Complaints GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_complaints DESC;

SELECT Authorities.authority_name, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM Complaints JOIN Authorities ON Complaints.user_id = Authorities.authority_id GROUP BY Authorities.authority_name ORDER BY total_complaints DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE complaint_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT * FROM authorities WHERE location='New York';
SELECT complaint_date, complaint_text, user_id FROM cyberbullying_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE complaint_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT authority_name, location FROM authorities WHERE authority_type = 'government' ORDER BY authority_name;
SELECT * FROM Cyberbullying_Complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, user_id, complaint_text FROM Cyberbullying_Complaints WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY date_registered DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_complaints FROM Cyberbullying_Complaints GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Complaint_Updates WHERE update_type = 'resolved' ORDER BY date_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM Cyberbullying_Complaints WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT complaint_text FROM Cyberbullying_Complaints WHERE complaint_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, complaint_text FROM Cyberbullying_Complaints WHERE date_submitted >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Users.username, Cyberbullying_Complaints.complaint_text FROM Users JOIN Cyberbullying_Complaints ON Users.user_id = Cyberbullying_Complaints.user_id WHERE Users.username LIKE '%John%';

SELECT Authorities.authority_name, Authorities.region, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM Cyberbullying_Complaints JOIN Authorities ON Cyberbullying_Complaints.authority_id = Authorities.authority_id GROUP BY Authorities.authority_name, Authorities.region;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_complaints;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE is_resolved = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM cyberbullying_complaints GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT authority_name, phone_number FROM authorities ORDER BY authority_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE is_resolved = true;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT complaint_text FROM cyberbullying_complaints WHERE LENGTH(complaint_text) > 100 AND is_resolved = false;
SELECT authorities.authority_name, complaints_status.status, complaints_status.update_date FROM authorities JOIN complaints_status ON authorities.authority_id = complaints_status.complaint_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = true;
